fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- No factional chat and no factional kill
- Counts as "Neutral" - can be rolled as neutrals or replace neutral faction entirely
- The game does not end when the Peasants win, and their presence doesn't stop the game from ending. The Peasants can win with any other faction
- Dead Peasants who've fulfilled their Destiny can win if the living Peasants do
- Peasants will know who each other are, but not their roles
- Peasants will appear innocent unless they're kill-capable.
- If a Peasant's destiny becomes unfulfillable they convert into a Peasant Jester
- Peasants who have targets will never have their targets be other Peasants, and they also won't share targets
- If a Peasant Killing is the only living Peasant, their goal is to be the last one standing
- Peasants can't target each other unless stated or required for their role to function

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
